content:
IWin32Window Interface

Definition

Provides an interface to expose Win32 HWND handles.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public interface IWin32Window
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute GuidAttribute InterfaceTypeAttribute

Examples

The following example sets the Text property of label1 to the current Handle of Form1. This example assumes that you have a Form called Form1 with a Label called label1 on it. 

public:
   Form1()
   {
      InitializeComponent();
      this->label1->Text = this->Handle.ToString();
   }

Public Sub New()
    InitializeComponent()
    
    Me.label1.Text = Me.Handle.ToString()
End Sub    


public Form1()
{
   InitializeComponent();

   this.label1.Text = this.Handle.ToString();
}

Remarks

This interface is implemented on objects that expose Win32 HWND handles. The resultant handle can be used with Win32 API calls.

Properties

Handle

Gets the handle to the window represented by the implementer.

public IntPtr Handle { get; }
Value
IntPtr

A handle to the window represented by the implementer.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute GuidAttribute InterfaceTypeAttribute

Remarks

Depending on the implementer, the value of the Handle property could change during the life of the window.
